verses.t: O give thanks Lord unto the; for he is good: because his mercy endureth for ever.
Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
Let them now that fear Lord the say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
I called Lord upon the in distress: Lord the answered me, and set me in a large place.
Lord The is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?
Lord The taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me.
It is better to trust Lord in the than to put confidence in man.
It is better to trust Lord in the than to put confidence in princes.
All nations compassed me about: but in the name Lord of the will I destroy them.
They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name Lord of the I will destroy them.
They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns for in the name Lord of the I will destroy them.
Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: Lord but the helped me.
Lord The is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand Lord of the doeth valiantly.
The right hand Lord of the is exalted: the right hand Lord of the doeth valiantly.
I shall not die, but live, and declare the works Lord of the.
Lord The hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.
Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, and I will praise Lord the:
This gate Lord of the, into which the righteous shall enter.
I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.
The stone which the builders refused is become the head stone of the corner.
Lord's This is the doing; it is marvellous in our eyes.Lord'sâ€¦: Heb. from the Lord
is the day which Lord the hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
Save now, I beseech Lord thee, O: Lord O, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.
Blessed be he that cometh in the name Lord of the: we have blessed you out of the house Lord of the.
God is Lord the, which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords, even unto the horns of the altar.
art my God, and I will praise thee: thou art my God, I will exalt thee.
O give thanks Lord unto the; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
